ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - UI: added jkUtils SunCalc widget (contributed by Jan) - UI: new stacked events popup - UI: added real time events via persistent http connection using EventSource - UI: deprecated event and modules polling - UPnP interface is now disabled on factory settings - Updated Jint engine library to 2.1.0 - added RealTime.EventStream api call to Logging handler - SerialPortLib: wrapped MessageReceived event in an high priority thread (perhaps solving rpi general hang issues?)
